stanza.line: So oft have I invoked thee for my (a)muse(/a)
And found such fair assistance in my (b)verse(/b)
As every alien pen hath got my (a)use(/a)
Thine eyes that taught the dumb on high to (c)sing(/c)
Have added feathers to the learned's (c)wing(/c)
Yet be most proud of that which I (e)compile(/e)
Whose influence is thine and born of (f)thee(/f)
In others' works thou dost but mend the (e)style(/e)
And arts with thy sweet graces graced (f)be(/f)
But thou art all my art and dost (g)advance(/g)
As high as learning my rude (g)ignorance(/g)
